author: xtqqczze

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Why do we need this? The default is already `public`.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> Why do we need this? The default is already `public`.

It makes the configuration explicit.

For [CA1801](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1801) and [CA2208](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2208) the default `api_surface` is `all`.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> For [CA1801](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1801) and [CA2208](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2208) the default `api_surface` is `all`.

All the more reason not to change the default value

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> > For [CA1801](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1801) and [CA2208](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2208) the default `api_surface` is `all`.
> 
> All the more reason not to change the default value

This PR doesn't change the default value for any analyzer.
